## HKDF HMAC-SHA2 Test Vectors

Test vectors have been generated with the Python [cryptography](https://cryptography.io/en/latest/) package.
This package has been [tested](https://cryptography.io/en/latest/development/test-vectors/)
with the original test vectors from the [RFC 5869](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5869.html).

All inputs (IKM, Salt and Info) are treated as strings. All Outputs are in hex.


#### Test Case 1
```
     Input:
       IKM = "0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b"
       Salt = "000102030405060708090a0b0c"
       Info = ""
       dkLen = 32

     Output:
       HKDF-HMAC-SHA256 = c09aedd85c6c1ccdd2f641c592d07336c7c189d8b634b0f9cf3d993ffefc19f8

       HKDF-HMAC-SHA384 = 78a419af9d543af83198f46f2639af78c3281c5f2cb80a9f1689693a6eb02c69

       HKDF-HMAC-SHA512 = 55f4e219c32e613b33c637e4795379e886c8babb53cfbb9b8fa201fc7fdf604a

```
#### Test Case 2
```
    Input:
      IKM = "000102030405060708090a0b0c0d0e0f101112131415161718191a1b1c1d1e1f202122232425262728292a2b2c2d2e2f303132333435363738393a3b3c3d3e3f404142434445464748494a4b4c4d4e4f"
      Salt = "salt"
      Info = "random InF\0"
      dkLen = 128

    Output:
      HKDF-HMAC-SHA256 = "16c3eaf4774677572e7cf7697d4a21b9f196dfa4215df8f733bb483c17260408c8f1778ce323e7166f40f1c680845e9bcbda4eeaed6d1ef8b49614811449bfb4774693094c205e905038287f637b59ea4a0096f479831fa2da49f131d993838aa94568c98f0cf94352922f15e4844e80d390819851eccbb89c2d6b70d7709701"

      HKDF-HMAC-SHA384 = "f1441f6db103b9edbb14dbecb72f737185356ff210915026d4cdce984193c5f07f44d0b02a2a8ff8d82ee9b6e2ef79b7731fe61eb351c1a7f01f6096a2902fd1e1d4c48d525a6aa9515252218d33782f8687cc38699b0c304f14cc4263f182b3ad73f3bb815afc16dd785c9b0654240cf2a7a4f2bba53090247ce7bfee6e3b6f"

      HKDF-HMAC-SHA512 = "56b03ea00ca8ef5bf639027ae10af7c0392f619a63b40cf61f305505f4e2c039df6e1baae41f0f8545bba840afe297d8da514b03892233076ad0a38a5215d21c37757bb753c60cc03b2b71bb4cad3fced96a9038b4b4369c9863879dd2e17d0c84d889e07f57a4502e2137b042a0e913974fadbee53ff94a5bdae6aaae333766"

```
#### Test Case 3
```
    Input:
      IKM = "password"
      Salt = "606162636465666768696a6b6c6d6e6f707172737475767778797a7b7c7d7e7f808182838485868788898a8b8c8d8e8f909192939495969798999a9b9c9d9e9fa0a1a2a3a4a5a6a7a8a9aaabacadaeaf"
      Info = ""
      dkLen = 256

    Output:
      HKDF-HMAC-SHA256 = ""

      HKDF-HMAC-SHA384 = ""

      HKDF-HMAC-SHA512 = ""

```
#### Test Case 4
```
    Input:
      IKM = "0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b0b"
      Salt = "s$#$#%$#SBGHWE@#W#lt"
      Info = "random InF\0"
      dkLen = 256

    Output:
      HKDF-HMAC-SHA256 = ""

      HKDF-HMAC-SHA384 = ""

      HKDF-HMAC-SHA512 = ""

```
#### Test Case 5
```
    Input:
      IKM = "passwordPASSWORDpassword"
      Salt = "salt"
      Info = ""
      dkLen = 32

    Output:
      HKDF-HMAC-SHA256 = 573b98885355e49f23dacdcaf549f0edfdf366a32444485b28153c7f464c8f46

      HKDF-HMAC-SHA384 = 3c58b0271ffd73b3b4347e5ebd3220083296bad2ac3294f72b14fe1b52754b27

      HKDF-HMAC-SHA512 = 1ef9dccc02d5786f0d7133da824afe212547f2d8c97e9299345db86814dcb9b8

```
#### Test Case 6
```
    Input:
      IKM = "pass\0word"
      Salt = "saltSALTSALTSALTSALTSALTSALTSALTSALTSALTSALTSALTSALT"
      Info = "b0b1b2b3b4b5b6b7b8b9babbbcbdbebfc0c1c2c3c4c5c6c7c8c9cacbcccdcecfd0d1d2d3d4d5d6d7d8d9dadbdcdddedfe0e1e2e3e4e5e6e7e8e9eaebecedeeeff0f1f2f3f4f5f6f7f8f9fafbfcfdfeff"
      dkLen = 16

    Output:
      HKDF-HMAC-SHA256 = 66a97daec3ccce13a83d89578c024ac3

      HKDF-HMAC-SHA384 = fcca6c780d9fd74cebc6682592bea53e

      HKDF-HMAC-SHA512 = ae4107effdae85d156832ec28e6e84e6

```
